news.title: Chris Mason: Labour still has a big persuasion job ahead
news.summary: Ministers hope a partial U-turn will win over Labour rebels when MPs vote on welfare changes later.

news.title: Guilty plea expected over 2022 murders of four Idaho students
news.summary: Relatives of one victim posted on Facebook that the state had failed them by allowing a plea deal.

news.title: US-Israeli backed Gaza aid group must be shut down, say 130 charities
news.summary: The call from some of the world's top aid organisations and charities comes after reports of soldiers killing hundreds of of Palestinians at aid sites.

news.title: Father and daughter plucked from sea after cruise ship drama
news.summary: Crew members were able to quickly rescue the pair, who were on the last day of a Disney cruise to the Bahamas.

news.title: US Senate holds marathon vote on Trump's 'big beautiful bill'
news.summary: Senators are debating a nearly 1,000-page bill that is pivotal to President Donald Trump's domestic agenda.
